name: The Quest to Destroy Some Grass
name_original: The Quest to Destroy Some Grass
description: A long time has passed since the Chosen One defended and touched grass, and his power has only grown since then. Despite the Rebellion's best efforts, they have yet to infiltrate the Chosen One's lair and destroy his precious grass. You have been assigned by the rebellion to topple the Chosen One's regime and burn that grass until the only thing that remains is ash!
